meanings.sent1: She completed her chores duteously every day.
meanings.sent2: He followed the instructions duteously to avoid any mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The dog wagged its tail duteously when asked to sit.
meanings.sent4: The sun rose duteously over the horizon, painting the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The student duteously took notes during the entire lecture to ensure good grades.

meanings.sent1: The duteous soldier saluted his commanding officer.
meanings.sent2: She received praise for her duteous behavior in class.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a duteous nod before sauntering away.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood duteous in the face of the storm, its branches swaying but not breaking.
meanings.sent5: The duteous employee always arrived early and stayed late to complete tasks.
